e.t:
#### Wedit

([wedit.io](https://wedit.io)) - ([GitHub](https://github.com/sofmon/wedit))

`wedit` uses static HTML website as template and allows content to be changed through WYSIWYG editing using the web browser. All changes are immediate and align with the intended website design.

---

#### Arke.app (work in progress)

([arke.app](https://arke.app)) - ([GitHub](https://github.com/sofmon/arke.app))

Decentralized, server-less, point to point encrypted messenger app: No servers; No sniffing; No control; No influence.

Arke (Greek: Ἄρκη Arkē) was a daughter of Thaumas. During the Titanomachy, she betrayed the Olympian gods and joined the Titans against them; she became the messenger for the Titans, while her fraternal twin sister Iris was on the opposite side and became the messenger of the Olympian Gods.

`arke.app` is an effort to oppose the Olympian Gods with their worldwide server clusters, big data, artificial intelligence and give power back to the Titans, to communicate freely once more.

([wedit.io](https://wedit.io) - [GitHub](https://github.com/sofmon/wedit))

A tool thast uses static HTML website as template and allows content to be changed through **WYSIWYG** editing using the web browser. All changes are immediate and align with the intended website design.

Sofmon is an attempt to build set of tools that replace unnecessary dependency on obscure services.

Tools to be used by your own judgment and nobody else's.

- [Wedit](https://wedit.it) - Website edit tool
- [Arke.app](https://arke.app) - Decentralized, server-less messanger
